Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class EchoServerClientHandler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.EchoServerClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EchoServerClientHandler extends Thread
Handles connection to a single client.

  • Constructor Details

    • EchoServerClientHandler

      public EchoServerClientHandler(Socket socket, ArrayList<Game> gameArrayList)
      Sets the connection socket and the list of active games
      Parameters:
      socket - connection socket
      gameArrayList - list of active games

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Run method of the thread. Maps every command to the relative method, instantiates a new BufferedReader and PrinterWriter exchange messages with the client. While the connection socket is open reads incoming messages. Removes a player from the current game if the connection with the client stops
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • quit

      private void quit(Command command)
      Manages disconnection requests from the client. Remove the player from the current game, closes the connection socket

    • checkTurn

      private boolean checkTurn()
      Check if the player is the current player
      Returns:
      boolean value corresponding to the check result

    • newGame

      private void newGame(Command command)
      Starts a new Game and adds it to the games list
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the desired number of player

    • avlGames

      private void avlGames(Command command)
      Sends to the client the list of available games If a game has ended and is flagged as "ENDED" it gets removed from the games list
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client

    • joinGame

      private void joinGame(Command command)
      Select one game from the games list and sets it as the current game for this client handler. Checks if the input from the client is correct and if then chosen game is still active
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the selected game as value1

    • login

      private void login(Command command) throws IOException
      Manages login to a game. Send a message to the client containing the
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the player's username as value1
      Throws:
      IOException - If an exception occurred setting up the PrinterWriter

    • playCharacterCard

      private void playCharacterCard(Command command)
      Play a character card
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the card's index as value1 and an optional argument as value2 for special cards' effects

    • sendSingleIsland

      private void sendSingleIsland(Command command)
      Sends to the client information about one island selected by the user
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the island

    • playAssistantCard

      private void playAssistantCard(Command command)
      Calls the Game method to move a student to play an assistant card Checks if the game is currently in the action phase and if it's the player turn Sends and error message to the client in case failure
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the chosen student to move from the hall

    • moveStudentToIsland

      private void moveStudentToIsland(Command command)
      Calls the Game method to move a student to an island Checks if the game is currently in the action phase and if it's the player turn Sends and error message to the client in case failure
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the chosen student to move from the hall

    • moveStudentToClassroom

      private void moveStudentToClassroom(Command command)
      Calls the Game method to move a student to the classrooms Checks if the game is currently in the action phase and if it's the player turn Sends and error message to the client in case failure
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the chosen student to move from the hall

    • errorSelectionNotify

      private void errorSelectionNotify()
      Sends an error message to the client regarding student selection from the hall

    • moveMotherNature

      private void moveMotherNature(Command command)
      Call the Game method to move mother nature Check if the player can move mother nature at that moment and if the input from the user is acceptable before calling the game method Sends and error message to the client in case failure
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the chosen cloud card

    • chooseCC

      private void chooseCC(Command command)
      Call the Game method to choose a cloud card Check if the player can choose a cloud card at that moment and if the input from the user is acceptable before calling the game method
      Parameters:
      command - message payload received from the client, contains the index of the chosen cloud card
